message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both parties, with its worth estimated at $15000 to you. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am extending a special offer to you at a price of $14500. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality product at a competitive price. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Kind regards, Alice.
